game_description: Radial-G: Proteus is a futuristic arcade racer for the VR generation! Climb into the cockpit of a gravity-defying race craft and tear up the tubular tracks as battle commences. Radial-G delivers full immersion racing featuring gut-wrenching twists, jumps, splits and unique inverted racing. Featuring: - 8 modes including combat, elimination & championship - 9 racetracks - Kicking electronic soundtrack - Single player career mode - 4 unlockable ships - 3 speed classes - Achievements & leaderboards OMEGA Update ‚Äì Now Live: Battle a giant mechanoid boss on a signature Radial-G track - avoid an array of attacks and deliver your own knock-out blows. - New boss-fight game-mode with 3 difficulty tiers - Additional racetrack - Expanded single player campaign - 3 more unlockable ships The Omega update delivers performance improvements, specifically within the top two difficulty tiers (X-II and X-III) plus visual improvements within the ship cockpits and additional audio elements.
review_1: If you like Wipeout then this is it. My younger brother who's 54, has been a Wipeout fan from its original version on the Sony Ps1 days. He never like any of the clones of it. So I let him have my Quest over the weekend, while I'm working. Got my Quest back and now he agrees with me that this game is better than Wipeout.
review_2: Its just a really bad game, never buy
review_3: I was raised here in Orlando and one of my favorite rides as a child was "space mountain" it was a roller coaster in the dark with flashing multicolored lights and many twists, turns and dips. This is very similar, only u can control the pod and every now and then u leave the track! The music sounds like nine inch nails. Very fun.
review_4: I love this game i came from the ps1 generation i loved wipeout and always dreamed of actually flying something this futuristic and vr fabulous üë©‚ÄçüöÄ
review_5: Difficulty is beyond frustration. No real feel for speed. Absolutly mediocre gameplay. Buy it when its for sale like a 5er. Not worth your money and time.
